channel.title: [PI] Welcome screen interface help!
channel.description:
I want to make an interface where when players login it pops p with an interface that says Welcome to Nitro-Scape- [shadow=red,left]Updates:[/shadow] { updates here }
[ Welcome message here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ]
[shadow=yellow,left]CLICK HERE TO PLAY![/shadow]
but i dont know how to add interfaces to a project insanity plz help and i will do anything i can to help you :)
